channel.title: Project crimson 525 (d claws)
channel.description:
so this is a 525 server project that i started with some friends.
NOTE: THIS WILL NOT BE RELEASED
we currently have login, player rendering and commands (such as ::item)
before we get into stuff like construction and skills we're finishing the basics.
need before anything:
walking talking player equipment shops trading
then we will add a basic player combat and some basic skills (crafting fletching)
this server WILL be hosted and played.
the plan:
do above then start adding skills (we will only add it when it is 100% ready. so you can get all the way up to 99 like normal runescape items except better xp.)
Programmers -
Ethanofenjd Gods Army ViruZ3 *Help from Cellkyborg*
2-7-09 - Player rendering & setItem & setSkills. - [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/14e2nav.jpg[/img]
2-8-09 - Equipment working [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/10n9ws7.jpg[/img]
2-9-09 ( didnt get to work today) Model problem fixed. [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2mc82v8.jpg[/img][/QUOTE]

item.title: Project crimson 525 (d claws)
item.dc:creator: @Gods_army Gods army
item.description:
@Gods_army wrote:

Whysoserious:

525… What benefits does this have instead of having a 508. Also does it have d claws?

better quests, independant coding (sort of), makes you do your own work, more items. it has practically all items runescape does now.

[quote=“Whysoserious, post:36, topic:261085”]Hell yes, notify (pm me) when its ready and send me client. This will be sick. Give me max stats+ d claws pl0x?

Lol anyway
When do you think it will be done? looks like its making some progress already…[/quote]

when you know the client is ready so will everybody else. we plan to do an ::item beta test (atleast i do) then go to no item. we have the mapdata for pest control fist of guthix and stealing creation also 100% clan wars… so we have a lot we can/have to do. we will not give free stuff but this will be a server where you actually have to gain items and levels to get anywhere.

cocoa:

I don’t see walking or player saving yet…

we working on walking. we will make video but we do have player saving.

no, on “google” it says project crimson and its made by ethanondj… im making both. THIS IS 525

Read full topic
